page.title: 04PRINCIPAL FEATURES 2
page.content: The{railway station}handles 350 trains and almost 30,000 travellers/day maki- ng it second only to Paddington in the Western Region.It is badly overcrowded but there are ambitious plans for a new station on the site{Forbury Garden is an attractive area of trees and plants.It includes the Mainwand Lion a cast iron war memorial.It was the largest standing lion in the world when built in 1886,the ruins of Reading Abbey,founded 1121,are nearby Thelower 4 miles of the{Kennet and {Avon}canal,opened 1810,runs through 200 hectarees of unimproved land in the south of the area.It is now being restored for pleasure craft.Othermain features of the area include:Battle Hospital,Readings second major unit Prospect Park Reading's largest at 50 hectares;the Assize courts;and the football stadium home of Reading Royal
